For <S%G1063><s%> rulers <S%G758><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a terror <S%G5401><s%> to <S%G2041><s%> good <S%G18><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to the evil <S%G2556><s%>. Do <S%G4160><s%> that which is good <S%G18><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> you shall have <S%G2192><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the same <S%G846><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> that which is evil <S%G2556><s%>, be afraid <S%G5399><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> he bears <S%G5409><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the sword <S%G3162><s%> in vain <S%G1500><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> the minister <S%G1249><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, a revenger <S%G1558><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> execute wrath <S%G3709><s%> upon him that does <S%G4238><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> you must needs <S%G318><s%> be subject <S%G5293><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> conscience sake <S%G4893><s%>.

So <S%G1063><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> this cause <S%G5124><s%> pay <S%G5055><s%> taxes <S%G5411><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s ministers <S%G3011><s%>, attending continually <S%G4342><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> very thing <S%G846><s%>.

Render <S%G591><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> their dues <S%G3782><s%>: tax <S%G5411><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> tax <S%G5411><s%> is due <S%G5056><s%>; custom to whom <S%G3588><s%> custom <S%G5056><s%>; fear <S%G5401><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>; honor <S%G5092><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3588><s%>, You shall <S%G3431><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%>, You shall <S%G5407><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> kill <S%G5407><s%>, You shall <S%G2813><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%>, You shall <S%G5576><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bear false witness <S%G5576><s%>, You shall <S%G1937><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> covet <S%G1937><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> there be any <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%>, it is briefly summed <S%G346><s%> up in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%>, namely <S%G1722><s%>, You shall love <S%G25><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> yourself <S%G1438><s%>.

Love <S%G26><s%> works <S%G2038><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> ill <S%G2556><s%> to his neighbor <S%G4139><s%>: therefore <S%G3767><s%> love <S%G26><s%> is the fulfilling <S%G4138><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G5124><s%>, knowing <S%G1492><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> it is high time <S%G5610><s%> <S%G99999><s%> to awake <S%G1453><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> sleep <S%G5258><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is our <S%G2257><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> nearer <S%G1452><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we believed <S%G4100><s%>.

The night <S%G3571><s%> is far spent <S%G1161><s%>, the day <S%G2250><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%>: let us <S%G659><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> cast off <S%G659><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> let us put on <S%G1746><s%> the armor <S%G3696><s%> of light <S%G5457><s%>.

Let us walk <S%G4043><s%> honestly <S%G2156><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%>; not <S%G3361><s%> in rioting <S%G2970><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drunkenness <S%G3178><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> in promiscuity <S%G2845><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wantonness <S%G766><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> in strife <S%G2054><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> envying <S%G2205><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> put on <S%G1746><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> provision <S%G4307><s%> for the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, to <S%G1519><s%> fulfill its lusts <S%G1939><s%>.
